Uses of Class
es.uam.eps.padsof.emailconnection.FailedInternetConnectionException

    • Uses of FailedInternetConnectionException in es.uam.eps.padsof.emailconnection

      Methods in es.uam.eps.padsof.emailconnection that throw FailedInternetConnectionException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void EmailSystem.send(java.lang.String emailStr, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body)
      This method sends an email message after successfully checking the Internet connection and the validity of the destination email address, and no trace is printed.
      static void EmailSystem.send(java.lang.String emailStr, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String body, boolean trace)
      This method sends an email message after successfully checking the Internet connection and the validity of the destination email address, and prints a trace if its last parameter is set to true.
